short_summary: The requirement is for the supply and delivery of 4600 passive absorption  dosimeters containing Tenax powder
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME... ( description continuation omitted for brevity )
full_summary:
### Title
W7701-247838: Tenax Samplers B Tender

### Publication Information
Publication Date: May 7, 2024

Tender Closing Date: May 30, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EDT

Solicitation Number: WS4422824947

Amendment Number: 1
### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of Tenax samplers. 

### Contract Information
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 13, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 15, 2026
* Regions of Delivery: Alberta

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to qualified contractors who are eligible to participate in the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and potentially other trade agreements as per the contract details.

### Contact Information
Contact: Lee, Oana (SPAC/ PSPC)  
Phone: Not Available  
Email: [oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)  
Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19622666?extsite=MTk2MjI2NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Amendment and Cancellation
Note that there was an amendment to the closing time for all bidders and a change to the requirement determined. This amendment modifies the closing time for bidders, necessitating a bid submission to occur no later than May 30, 2024, at 14h00 EDT. As per agreement, all submitted bids after this time will be declared non-responsive. All individuals and business partners should participate in submitting required documentation and bid submission accordingly.

Keywords: Tenax samplers, Personal Safety equipment, DND  
Region(s): Alberta, Quebec  

Procurement Category: Goods  
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding  
Procurement Procedure: Lowest price  
Notice Type: Request for Proposal  
Publications are available from Ariba Discovery. Requestors should register a free account to participate in this acquisition. 

 
Reference Number: WS4422824947  
Procurement Description: defence research institution. personal saftey and protection equipment: tenax samplers.
